name: claude-session-plugin
description: Session-Driven Development for Claude Code - Maintain perfect context across multiple AI coding sessions with quality gates, dependency management, and knowledge accumulation
longDescription:
The Claude Code Session Plugin implements Session-Driven Development (SDD), a comprehensive methodology that enables AI coding assistants to work on software projects across multiple sessions with:

- **Perfect context continuity** through automated briefings
- **Quality enforcement** via automated validation gates
- **Knowledge accumulation** through AI-powered learning curation
- **Dependency-driven workflow** with critical path analysis
- **Living documentation** with git integration

Includes 15 slash commands for session management, work item tracking, learning capture, and quality gates. Production-ready with 343 tests passing.

plugin.description: Full Session-Driven Development plugin with 15 commands for comprehensive project management
